scripts.lint: npm --prefix ./client run lint && npm --prefix ./server run lint
scripts.lint:fix: npm --prefix ./client run lint:fix && npm --prefix ./server run lint:fix
scripts.format: npm --prefix ./client run format && npm --prefix ./server run format
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd ./server && npm run dev" "cd ./client && npm run start"
scripts.start: concurrently "cd ./server && npm run start" "cd ./client && npm run start"
